Header.title: The Binaryz
Header.paragraph: Disrupting Conventional Norms For A Better Future!

About.paragraph: Started in September 2012 at the college dorms of Birla Institute of Technology and Science, The Binaryz is a team of tech enthusiasts who believe in disrupting conventional norms and generate use cases for businesses. The concept shaped up over years through pitching the idea in various competitions and being incubated with YAL (Young Arab Leaders). The Binaryz specialises and operates in the fields of CyberSecurity, Robotics and IoT, disrupting conventional business norms with faster, optimised and efficient technology. We work with a vision to have technologies at finger tips through solutions, applications and platforms by building state of the art technology simple yet sophisticated for businesses by taking all the complexities to build, operate and transfer YOUR vision.
Why: Data Security, Robotics, Drones, artificial intelligence, Internet of Things and Machine Learning are the buzz words, the world is moving towards today and The Binaryz foresees this to be the future of companies marking and evergreen segment to be always in practice.
Why2: Our technology partners have been recognised in the industry by YAL (Young Arab Leaders), UAE government through DFG (Drones for Good), Pitch@Palace, Cyber UK and a few mentions in the local media.

Services.name: Cybersecurity
Services.text: Niche technologies having high potential to solve increasing challenges in the cyberspace.

Services.name: Robotics
Services.text: Applications of drones and robotic technologies across segments such as land survey, 3D mapping, photogrammetry in the field of construction, agriculture, surveying, telecom and mining.

Services.name: IoT
Services.text: Internet of Things applications bringing the digital space at your fingertips through solutions like smart water meter, fleet management, asset management and tracking.
